name: InvisiRogue Remastered
description:
InvisiRogue is a multiplayer action game you (and as many input devices you can muster) play as a rogues - setting out to steal the treasure from the local dungeon and escape!

Play as unique characters with different starting abilities to grab loot and maybe stab your "friends" in the back before escaping the dungeon. 

Between rounds you can spend gold to buy/upgrade skills. Ultimately setting yourself up for the 5th and final round of the game where the there can only be one winner. The player who grabs the treasure and manages to get out wins. 

Originally a submission for the Multiplayer Game Jam 2022 - reworked into this glorious GOTY editon by Team Kazooboys.
